hero.title: Turn Your Vision Into One-of-a-Kind Jewelry
hero.subtitle: Describe what you imagine. Watch it come to life in 3D. Have master jewelers craft it just for you.

features.title: Why Thousands Trust Us
features.subtitle: Experience the future of jewelry design with our AI-powered platform

ai.title: Your Ideas, Instantly Visualized
ai.description: Describe your vision in plain words. Watch AI transform it into stunning 3D designs.

preview.title: See Every Angle Before You Commit
preview.description: Rotate, zoom, and explore every detail in real-time 3D before you decide.

pricing.title: Know Your Price Upfront
pricing.description: No surprises. See exact pricing based on materials and craftsmanship instantly.

quality.title: Handcrafted by Master Jewelers
quality.description: Your design, brought to life by expert artisans using only premium materials.

howItWorks.title: From Idea to Your Hand in 4 Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: From your imagination to a stunning piece of jewelry in four simple steps

step1.title: Share Your Vision
step1.description: Tell us what you want - the style, occasion, or feeling you're after.

step2.title: Watch AI Create
step2.description: Our AI generates unique 3D jewelry designs based on your description.

step3.title: Perfect Your Design
step3.description: Chat with AI to refine details - adjust size, add stones, tweak the style.

step4.title: We Craft It For You
step4.description: Master jewelers handcraft your unique piece with premium materials.

cta.title: Ready to Bring Your Vision to Life?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands who've created their dream jewelry

checkout.thankYou: Thank you for your order! You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

checkout.confirmationEmailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to:

checkout.step2Desc: You'll receive email updates as your jewelry is being made.
